query: query Heroes($episode: Episode, $unit: LengthUnit) { heroes(episode: $episode) { id name appearsIn ... on Human { __typename starships { id name length(unit: $unit) } totalCredits } ... on Droid { __typename primaryFunction } } }

query Droid($id: ID!, $unit: LengthUnit) { droid(id: $id) { id name friends { id name appearsIn ... on Human { __typename starships { id name length(unit: $unit) } totalCredits } ... on Droid { __typename primaryFunction } } appearsIn primaryFunction } }
